answers.answer: You have posted on the Diabetes T2 forum. I suggest you redirect your post to the Eye Care forums.

question: I will have to have cataract surgery in the next year or 2. I am a hi risk patient because of Diabetes, thin retina and very hi Myopia. I am in South Florida and would like some recommendations for Surgeons. Live in Ft Lauderdale area but would go to West Palm Beach or Miami and anywhere in between.Which lenses are recommended?
title: Hi risk cataract surgery
